title: Hour 1: Don't Hate... Donate
description:
Kendrick Perkins, Jay Williams, Bart Scott, Dan Orlovsky and Todd Frazier discuss the Astros history making no hitter, why the Packers didn't make a trade deadline move and who's had a more impressive season: Tyreek Hill or Patrick Mahomes?

itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: Was the response from Kyrie and the Nets appropriate?
